str2: Probably from the same as pale; anew, i.e. back, once more, or furthermore or on the other hand.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To bend, stoop down, bow the head. Probably from the base of kuma; to bend forward.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Contracted from a primary word; soil; by extension a region, or the solid part or the whole of the terrene globe.
